EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Today's call (1561386064.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Margaret,
I hope all is well and thanks for your time on the phone with me today. I hope the fire drill goes well. Please provide me with the logo and I will get a quote done for you. Thanks again and have a good one.
Cheers,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>
